Module com.pld.agile
Package com.pld.agile.utils.observer

Interface Observer

All Known Implementing Classes:
GraphicalView, TextualView, TourData
public interface Observer
A class that implements Observer must implement an update method called when the observed object is updated.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    update(Observable observed, UpdateType updateType)
    Called by the observed Observable when he is updated, with the UpdateType to specify what kind of update happens.

  • Method Details

    • update

      void update(Observable observed, UpdateType updateType)
      Called by the observed Observable when he is updated, with the UpdateType to specify what kind of update happens.
      Parameters:
      observed - Observable the caller
      updateType - UpdateType the type of update
